snippet.title: Web Bites: Science of cooking; cheese quiz
snippet.description: Web Bites is a weekly roundup of recipes, cooking tips, news and blog posts from around the Internet. Look for it on Mondays to help you through the week. So, blogging has been a little sporadic lately, with holidays and travels and general merriment.

snippet.title: PBS NewsHour Science online
snippet.description: PBS NewsHour has launched PBS NewsHour Science , a destination on the Web for the latest news in science, engineering and technology. The site went live yesterday and hosts the reporting from NewsHour Science Correspondent Miles Oâ€™Brien, NewsHour Digital Correspondent Hari Sreenivasan, reporter Jenny Marder and the PBS
